Directions
Combine gochujang, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, garlic, ginger, and sesame oil in a large bowl and whisk to combine. Gochujang can be inconsistent in its thickness. Add up to 2 tablespoons water until sauce is just barely thin enough to drop off a spoon with inverted. Serve with
Korean Fried Chicken.
Notes
Gochujang is a mildly spicy and sweet Korean chile paste that can be found in most Asian markets.
